name: Eggsploration
description:
An Australian game made in 72 hours by a team of two. 

"You stumble across an egg on the ground in the bush. There are lots of critters around that would love to gobble up this egg! You should probably make sure this egg gets to where it's going safely."

This is our first game jam and our first game! We decided to participate last minute and are pretty happy with what we achieved with little experience and time :)

If you're participating in LudamDare 46 please rate us and give us feedback! We are keen to know what you think! Link here

Theme: Keep it alive!

Please follow us on Twitter @castle_chicken
